price: Nígbà náà, (mọlāika) pè é láti ìsàlẹ̀ ọ̀dọ̀ rẹ̀ pé: "Má ṣe banújẹ́. Dájúdájú Olúwa rẹ ti ṣe odò kékeré kan sí ìsàlẹ̀ ọ̀dọ̀ rẹ.
arabic: فَنَادَىٰهَا مِن تَحۡتِهَآ أَلَّا تَحۡزَنِي قَدۡ جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحۡتَكِ سَرِيّٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fanādāhā min taḥtihā allā taḥzanī qad jaʿala rabbuki taḥtaki sariyyan
